name: wyckoff-trading-system
description: Wyckoff Trading System with Regression Testing

scripts.test:regression: cd backend && poetry run python scripts/run_regression_test.py
scripts.test:regression:alert: cd backend && poetry run python scripts/run_regression_test.py --alert
scripts.test:regression:baseline: cd backend && poetry run python scripts/run_regression_test.py --establish-baseline
scripts.test:regression:full: cd backend && poetry run python scripts/run_regression_test.py --alert --output regression_results.json
